help_troubleshooting_diagnostics.lang_htd3: Ping checks whether the IP or URL address is reachable.
help_troubleshooting_diagnostics.lang_htd5: Enter the IP or URL address you want to test.
help_troubleshooting_diagnostics.lang_htd7: Enter the packet size you want to send.
help_troubleshooting_diagnostics.lang_htd9: Enter the number of times you wish to test the connection.
help_troubleshooting_diagnostics.lang_htd11: To run the test, click this option. The Ping screen shows if the test is successful.
help_troubleshooting_diagnostics.lang_htd13: Traceroute displays the route that packets travel between your computer and the IP or URL address.
help_troubleshooting_diagnostics.lang_htd15: Enter the IP or URL address you want to test.
help_troubleshooting_diagnostics.lang_htd17: To run the test, click this option. The Traceroute screen shows if the test is successful.
help_troubleshooting_diagnostics.lang_htd18: Note: For more information, refer to the online User Guide at www.linksys.com.
